title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E Ms. Leila Bin – Juda

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E Ms Leila Bin – Juda, Australian High Commissioner to Nigeria today, 22nd May, 2024.
Discussed bilateral matters with focus on education (collaboration with TETFund in the area of scholarships for Nigerian students), culture, consular matters and improved bilateral relations.
